name: rawst-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is burned, it consumes this item to cure the burn. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures a burn.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when burned to cure a burn.

flavor_text.black_white: If held by a Pokémon, it recovers from a burn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: If held by a Pokémon, it recovers from a burn.
